# ArtworkImage

**Structure**

A view that displays the image for a music item’s artwork.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct ArtworkImage
```

## Overview

You can create an artwork image with an instance of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/MusicKit/Artwork].

While the artwork’s image data is loading, [doc://com.apple.MusicKit/documentation/MusicKit/ArtworkImage] automatically displays a placeholder with a solid color that matches the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/MusicKit/Artwork/backgroundColor] property of the artwork to render.

## Initializers

- **init(_:height:)**: Creates an instance with a specified height.
- **init(_:width:)**: Creates an instance with a specified width.
- **init(_:width:height:)**: Creates an instance with a specified width and height.

## Artwork

- **Artwork**: An object that represents artwork for a music item.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- View
